about_the_game:
You're a fan of Bearskull and want to help us make it even better and more exciting? Can't wait for the second part?

Then support us now with the Supporter Package. Bearskull is our passion project, where 100% of our dedication flows into it. However, sometimes that's simply not enough.

To advance the development even faster, we also need financial resources.

Of course, you'll get something in return for your money. From the moment of purchase, your little companion, the Warrior Soul, will no longer be blue but will glow in golden hues as it follows you in-game. This way, you can show your friends that you are part of the Bearskull development.

And rest assured, 100% of the proceeds go towards the development of Bearskull.

name: Bearskull - Supporter Paket

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB, OpenGL
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: This makes Bearskull even better and helps us at the same time
